title: Need help from Riot Designers!!!
body:
I am in need of help from Designers from Riot. This means Web Design, Character Design, Environmental Design, Game Design or anything of the such. I need to interview people who have experience in the design field for a presentation about designers and what they do.
I play League of Legends all the time and have been looking for Rioters to interview for almost a month now. Time is running out and I need help!
Here are some things that I made in classes based on Blitzcrank to look at, I try to do things based off LoL when possible.
